meanings.definition: (解剖学)胸鎖乳突筋の鎖骨頭
meanings.english_definition: (anatomy) The clavicular head of the sternocleidomastoid muscle.

examples.sentence: The monocleide is one of the two heads of the sternocleidomastoid muscle.
examples.translation: 胸鎖乳突筋の鎖骨頭は、胸鎖乳突筋の2つの頭のうちの1つです。

readability_explanation.text: This is a highly specialized anatomical term. Understanding requires knowledge of anatomy and Greek root words.
